item.title: Jenkins 2.326
item.description:
• Major RFE The agent-to-controller security subsystem is now always enabled. The admin-customizable allowlists for callables and file paths have been removed. The ability to access some files on the controller from agents has been removed. Some plugins are incompatible with this change and may need to be updated.
    • ,
  • RFE Add missing SVG for parameterized job icon.
    • ,
  • RFE Add "Report an issue" link to plugins in the plugin manager.
    • ,
  • RFE Upgrade [Groovy](https://groovy-lang.org/) from 2.4.12 to 2.4.21.
    • ,
  • Major bug - Restore support for symbolic links in the Jenkins home directory (regression in 2.325).
    • ,
  • RFE Developer: Stapler now returns an informative error message when a request is made for an invalid adjunct.
    • ,
  • RFE Developer: Deprecate SlaveToMasterFileCallable.

item.title: Jenkins 2.325
item.description:
• RFE Modernise the appearance of the plugin manager.
    • ,
  • RFE More reliably estimate plugin download progress.
    • ,
  • Bug Newly created items are again automatically made accessible to their creators to fix a regression in the matrix-auth plugin (regression in 2.324).
    • ,
  • Bug - Fix a resource leak when shutting down Jenkins.
    • ,
  • Bug - Fix a resource leak when a plugin fails to load.
    • ,
  • Bug Filtering now hides unavailable updates on "Updates" tab in Plugin Manager.
    • ,
  • Bug An agent-to-controller security measure failed to persist configuration.
    • ,
  • Bug Custom log records with large record parameters no longer interfere with garbage collection.
    • ,
  • RFE Developer: Add FilePath#validateAntFileMask(String, boolean) overload for convenience.
    • ,
  • RFE Developer: The option -Dhudson.ClassicPluginStrategy.useAntClassLoader=false allows experiments with plugin-first class loading alternatives.

item.title: Jenkins 2.324
item.description:
• RFE Improve logging for termination of cloud agents.
    • ,
  • Bug Fix appearance of table tooltips.
    • ,
  • RFE Developer: Plugins now have their Guice dependencies aligned with core.
    • ,
  • RFE Introduced Listeners.notify utility method to encourage safe listener notification.
    • ,
  • RFE Developer: Disable form element path in unit tests by default.
    • ,
  • RFE Deprecate FingerprintStorage.getFileFingerprintStorage. Developers should use FingerprintStorage Extension API instead.

item.title: Jenkins 2.323
item.description:
• RFE Add configuration-as-code support for managing log recorders.
    • ,
  • RFE Add path to form elements giving stable selectors for UI testing.
    • ,
  • Bug Update remoting from 4.11.1 to 4.11.2 to fix code signing.
    • ,
  • Bug Improve performance by lazy loading build records from the run list.
    • ,
  • Bug "View as plain text" shows correctly in polling log page.
    • ,
  • RFE Developer: New extension point Header as an interface that provides capabilities to render a specific header and a default implementation of that, named JenkinsHeader that is enabled by default.

item.title: Jenkins 2.322
item.description:
• RFE Issue a warning to the system log when using agent-to-controller file manipulation idioms considered for deprecation, and collect telemetry about this as well.
    • ,
  • RFE Add descriptions of built-in administrative alerts to the global configuration alert selection page.
    • ,
  • RFE Modernise System Info and Log Recorder pages.
    • ,
  • Bug Jenkins startup could hang due to a deadlock in class loading.
    • ,
  • Bug Display full user name, rather than id, in securityRealm page when using the built-in security realm (regression since 2.243).
    • ,
  • Bug Display the "Configure System" icon in the drop down menu.
    • ,
  • RFE Developer: Register UberClassLoader as parallel-capable.

item.title: Jenkins 2.321
item.description:
• RFE Modernise the table design and add support for Ionicons.
    • ,
  • RFE Remove superfluous user interface elements, including images, mask-icon, and unnecessary resize handles.
    • ,
  • RFE Only apply trimLabels operation to affected nodes when adding or removing them.
    • ,
  • Bug Maven tool configuration works again (regression in 2.320).
    • ,
  • Bug Show ongoing first build in build history (regression in 2.314).
    • ,
  • Bug Fix filtering in update tab of plugin manager (regression in 2.320).
    • ,
  • Bug Permit additional safe types in agent to controller access control (regression in 2.320).
    • ,
  • RFE Developer: Upgrade the Guice library from 4.0 (released April 28, 2015) to 5.0.1 (released March 2, 2021).
    • ,
  • RFE Developer: Bump spring-security-bom from 5.5.3 to 5.6.0.

item.title: Jenkins 2.320
item.description:
• Major RFE Upgrade the Guava library from 11.0.1 (released on January 9, 2012) to 31.0.1 (released on September 27, 2021). Plugins have already been prepared to support the new version of Guava; use the Plugin Manager to upgrade all plugins before and after upgrading Jenkins.
    • ,
  • RFE Modernise the 'New view' and 'New node' pages.
    • ,
  • RFE Improve artifact list readability in dark theme.
    • ,
  • RFE Use CSS animation for console progress.
    • ,
  • RFE Allow plugin upload by URL in addition to file name.
    • ,
  • RFE Update bundled version of Bouncy Castle API plugin from 2.20 to 2.25.
    • ,
  • Bug Prevent LinkageError during class loading (regression in 2.309).
    • ,
  • Bug Do not attempt to canonicalize tar entries when untaring, as the result may be unexpected for symlinks.
    • ,
  • Bug Fix form submission for file access rules of agent to controller security subsystem (regression in 2.111).
    • ,
  • Bug Avoid false positives in plugin search (installed tab).
    • ,
  • Bug Fix missing hyperlink in build history (regression in 2.314).
    • ,
  • Bug Add space between icon and project name (or build number) in all links to builds.
    • ,
  • Bug Add space between icon and project name in upstream & downstream section of project page.
    • ,
  • Bug Replace outdated URLs with working redirects.
    • ,
  • Bug An exception thrown by a RestartListener no longer leaves Jenkins in a zombie-like state.
    • ,
  • Bug Display the time zone of the user when an administrator updates a user account.
    • ,
  • RFE Developer: Provide a stable version of ObjectWebASM (currently 9.1) on the classpath.
    • ,
  • RFE Developer: Use the upstream version of AntClassLoader without custom patches.

item.title: Jenkins 2.319
item.description:
• Security Important security fixes.
    • ,
  • Major RFE Security hardening: Require role check for remoting callables.
    • ,
  • RFE Always allow configuring agent-to-controller security subsystem.

item.title: Jenkins 2.318
item.description:
• RFE Add XStream2 constructor matching super.
    • ,
  • RFE Remove deprecated, unsafe classes previously copied from Apache Ant. Docker Slaves plugin is incompatible with this change.
    • ,
  • RFE ExecutorListener may now be implemented as a static extension.
    • ,
  • RFE Update tooltips to be consistent across Jenkins.

item.title: Jenkins 2.317
item.description:
• RFE Screen Resolution cookie now has the secure flag set when Jenkins is running on HTTPS.
    • ,
  • RFE Deprecate the -cp option in the remoting agent.jar command line. Upgrade from Remoting 4.10 to Remoting 4.11.
    • ,
  • Bug Display ongoing build in build history (regression in 2.314).
    • ,
  • Bug Fix agent handshake when connecting over Websocket on Java 11. Upgrade from Remoting 4.10 to Remoting 4.11.
    • ,
  • Bug Reduce the amount of disk writes to logs/tasks/*.log when nothing interesting is happening.

item.title: Jenkins 2.316
item.description:
• RFE Update the French translation in the legend.
    • ,
  • RFE Display full plugin name and link when a plugin fails to load.
    • ,
  • RFE Improve error reporting for certain kinds of bugs in computer listeners.
    • ,
  • RFE Update bundled versions of Pipeline: API, Pipeline: Step API, SCM API, and Structs plugins.
    • ,
  • Bug Developer: Fix XStream2 support of unmarshalling implicit collections.

item.title: Jenkins 2.315
item.description:
• Security Security fixes.
    • ,
  • RFE Security hardening: The "short description" of build causes is now defined as plain text instead of HTML.

item.title: Jenkins 2.314
item.description:
• RFE Modernise the "Build History" search bar
    • ,
  • RFE Show new status icons in build history
    • ,
  • RFE Modernise the "Manage Jenkins" screen

item.title: Jenkins 2.313
item.description:
• RFE Allow a plugin to dynamically insert a JAR file into its classpath.
    • ,
  • RFE Remove the --daemon argument from Jenkins command line arguments. Replace Akuma library from Jenkins core with simpler implementations using ProcessTree capabilities
    • ,
  • Bug Allow Jenkins to start when the JCasC configuration defines view-related permissions (regression in 2.302).
    • ,
  • Bug Correction of Label expression including a "implies" relationship without spaces around.
    • ,
  • Bug WebSocket connections now work when the Jenkins controller is running Java 11 and using self-terminated TLS.

item.title: Jenkins 2.312
item.description:
• RFE Update executable war from 1.45 to 2.0
    • ,
  • Bug Replace the old icons with the new SVG icons in the job trend page.

item.title: Jenkins 2.311
item.description:
• Bug Fix wrong parameter type for Text Parameter when triggering a build via the buildWithParameters API call.
    • ,
  • RFE Graphs now scale correctly on high resolution screens.
    • ,
  • Bug The checkbox labeled "Enable Agent → Controller Access Control" in the form "Configure Global Security" would always start out as disabled. Submitting the form without checking it would then cause a configuration change (regression in 2.307).
    • ,
  • RFE Load classes from plugins in parallel for faster startup on multicore machines.
    • ,
  • RFE Internal: Experimental support for URLClassLoader can be enabled by setting hudson.ClassicPluginStrategy.useAntClassLoader=false.

item.title: Jenkins 2.310
item.description: • Bug Jenkins 2.310 was not placed in the artifact repository or on the download site.

item.title: Jenkins 2.309
item.description:
• Bug Fix missing settings/cog icon in Plugin Manager. Fix incorrect folder icon showing in projects (regression in 2.307).
    • ,
  • RFE Add ABORTED threshold to ReverseBuildTrigger.
    • ,
  • RFE Developer: Bump Java Native Access (jna) from 5.8.0 to 5.9.0.
    • ,
  • RFE Internal: AntClassLoader (and its subclass PluginFirstClassLoader) and MaskingClassLoader register themselves as parallel-capable.
    • ,
  • RFE Upgrade from xstream 1.4.17 to 1.4.18.

item.title: Jenkins 2.308
item.description:
• RFE Use SVGs over PNGs for the sidebar when possible. Breadcrumb bar/logo/menu items are now correctly aligned on the left together. Move old war/images folder to webapp so they can be used in frontend - the SVGs are now in the webapp/images/svgs folder.
    • ,
  • RFE Update appearance for feed bar and description button to be modern and consistent.
    • ,
  • RFE When the buildWithParameter API is called, if the requests with the same parameters in the queue are merged, the http response code of the request uses a more appropriate 303(see other) instead of 201(created).
    • ,
  • RFE Warn about use of master in a label expression when that's no longer in use.
    • ,
  • Bug Use full URL character encoding for the generated inbound agent launch string.
    • ,
  • Bug Use the JVM's default keystore type for the Jenkins server when terminating TLS connections within Jenkins. Used if Jenkins is started with the --httpsPort argument. Winstone 5.21: Update Jetty from 9.4.42.v20210604 to Jetty 9.4.43.v20210629.
    • ,
  • RFE Developer: Bump spring-security-bom from 5.5.1 to 5.5.2.

item.title: Jenkins 2.307
item.description:
• Major RFE Replace the term "master" with "controller" (for the main Jenkins application) or "built-in node" in user interface strings and documentation as appropriate.
    • ,
  • Major RFE Add migration code to change the node name (e.g. NODE_NAME environment variable) and label of the built-in node only after explicit migration by an administrator. New installations get the new node and label immediately. If a job definition, Pipeline definition, or tool installer reference must be tied to the built-in node, it should use the label "built-in".
    • ,
  • Major RFE Add the system property jenkins.model.Jenkins.nodeNameAndSelfLabelOverride to specify a different node name and label for the built-in node (e.g. for Configuration as Code use cases) than the one otherwise determined. This will not affect other uses of the node name, such as the URL to the built-in node (now /computer/(built-in)/).
    • ,
  • Bug GDSL file in jenkins-core library no longer reports an IllegalStateException when used in IntelliJ IDEA.
    • ,
  • RFE Improve layout of console output header.
    • ,
  • RFE Use the SVG version of the Jenkins text logo instead of the PNG.
    • ,
  • RFE Developer: Jenkins now uses an updated version of the AntClassLoader class with fewer custom patches.
    • ,
  • RFE Removed: The Woodstox implementation of the StAX API has been removed from Jenkins core. Users of the Azure Artifact Manager, Azure Container Agents, Azure Storage, and Azure SDK API plugins must upgrade those plugins to the latest versions in lockstep with this core upgrade. Plugins that consume Woodstox should depend on it directly or via the Jackson 2 API plugin.

item.title: Jenkins 2.306
item.description:
• Bug Provide working "Help About" links for Jenkins CLI, Jenkins core, and Jenkins war.
    • ,
  • RFE Developer: AntClassloader will now ignore files that are part of the classpath but not zip files when scanning for resources. It used to throw an exception.

item.title: Jenkins 2.305
item.description:
• Bug Show tooltips when users hover on the SVG icons.
    • ,
  • RFE Ability to disable Java 11 administrative monitor with a system property.
    • ,
  • RFE Developer: Make AntClassLoader multi-release JAR aware when it deals with java.util.jar.JarFile.

item.title: Jenkins 2.304
item.description:
• Bug Fix an issue unzipping archives in a corner case when entries have the same path prefix as the target location.
    • ,
  • RFE Avoid polluting the log when usage statistics can not be sent.
    • ,
  • RFE Bump matrix-auth from 2.6.7 to 2.6.8.
    • ,
  • RFE Bump bundled Ant from 1.10.10 to 1.10.11.
    • ,
  • RFE Remove support for native JNR (Java Native Runtime) chmod(2) and stat(2) implementations as opposed to NIO (Java non-blocking I/O) via the hudson.Util.useNativeChmodAndMode system property. This system property no longer has any effect.
    • ,
  • RFE Developer: Allow consumers of XmlFile to disable fsync(2).
    • ,
  • RFE Internal: Terminology cleanup to fix build time trend's distributed builds. Only show the agent column when the controller has agents defined.

item.title: Jenkins 2.303
item.description:
• RFE Bump commons-compress from 1.20 to 1.21.
    • ,
  • RFE Bump spring-security-bom from 5.5.0 to 5.5.1.

item.title: Jenkins 2.302
item.description:
• RFE Optimize access control checks affecting (at least) Pipeline node steps.
    • ,
  • RFE Developer: The hudson.util.SubClassGenerator and experimental hudson.model.TreeView class have been removed without replacement.
    • ,
  • RFE Internal: Upgrade from Remoting 4.9 to Remoting 4.10 with bugfixes and dependency updates.

item.title: Jenkins 2.301
item.description:
• Major bug Fix a regression in 2.298 where some plugins (including Azure Storage) could not correctly parse streaming XML output.
    • ,
  • RFE The Jenkins process management functionality now supports FreeBSD.
    • ,
  • RFE Bump jenkins from 1.64 to 1.65.
    • ,
  • RFE Winstone 5.19: Update Jetty from 9.4.41.v20210516 to Jetty 9.4.42.v20210604.

item.title: Jenkins 2.300
item.description: • Security Important security fixes.

item.title: Jenkins 2.299
item.description:
• RFE Update stapler from 1539.v2f05ce93882d to 1563.v3da2d02f9572.
    • ,
  • RFE Developer: InterceptingExecutorService and its subclasses no longer extend com.google.common.util.concurrent.ForwardingExecutorService or com.google.common.collect.ForwardingObject.
    • ,
  • RFE Remove jna-posix dependency from Jenkins core. Plugins that use jna-posix functionality must be migrated from jna-posix to jnr-posix.

item.title: Jenkins 2.298
item.description:
• RFE Document REST methods to mark an (agent) node temporarily offline and related tasks.
    • ,
  • RFE Add X-Frame-Options header to AJAX responses.

item.title: Jenkins 2.297
item.description:
• Major RFE Remove Apache Commons Digester library and related code from the Jenkins core.
    • ,
  • Bug Fix incorrect process termination issues when running on macOS.
    • ,
  • Bug Add check to prevent out of bounds memory access error on macOS.
    • ,
  • Bug A race condition in class loading could result in a LinkageError.
    • ,
  • Bug Do not change fonts when artifacts are as shown as a tree.
    • ,
  • RFE Bump sshd-core from 2.5.1 to 2.7.0 in Jenkins CLI.
